code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import notFound from'../../assets/imageNotFound.png';import'./bookItem.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var BookItem=function BookItem(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"book-cards",children:props.books.map(function(el){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"book-card__card-image",src:el.image!==""?el.image:notFound,alt:el.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"book-name",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Book name:"})," ",el.title.length<24?el.title:el.title.substr(0,24)+'...']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Book autor:"})," ",el.author]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Prise, $ ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:el.price})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"book-button",to:"/specific-book",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"book-view",onClick:function onClick(){localStorage.setItem('viewBook',JSON.stringify(el));},type:"button",children:"View"})})]})]},el.id);})});};export default BookItem;
